comments.body: This thread existed previously https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5467412.0https://thethaiger.com/hot-news/crime/bitcoin-investment-loss-sparks-domestic-violence-and-six-hour-police-standoff-in-ayutthayaAnd this is a mistake that does not have to have a negative impact on Bitcoin, because ordinary people who hear or read will judge this incident because of Bitcoin.The importance of knowledge and understanding of Bitcoin is to prevent large losses, and these stories often see domestic violence occurring due to the loss of large amounts of money due to investments, business or gambling which causes violence to occur suddenly due to momentary emotions.
